name: Shadow of the Dragon
description:
SHADOW OF THE DRAGON

Shadow of the dragon is s a free-to-play fighting (style of stickman) game, an action role playing game and a big adventure.
A great shadow battle, have to face against many enemies and evil monsters.

A ninja armed with a laser katana whose mission is to save the planet from hostile creatures that want to conquer it. Go through the levels to recover the sacred cockroaches and defeat the final boss, kill the enemies and the giant bosses to reach new levels to explore.

A rock soundtrack will guide you throughout the exploration and interaction with the characters of the game. Many levels to explore, RPG component and a non-linear exploration are the ingredients of Shadow of the Dragon.

The game is completely free in all its parts, there are no items to buy in order to go on and you will not have to spend a single cents to be play from start to finish.

Download it, try it and leave feedback.
